command.text:
&ExportImportTemplateQuery;
if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_gt_dvcs' and val = '1') select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName;

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where ngay_ks >= @dateCurrent)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_new = 1)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_edit = 1)
field.condition: if @costUnit = '1' begin⩓if @costUnit = '1' begin⩓if @costUnit = '1' begin if @@admin <> 1 begin⩓if @costUnit = '1' begin if @@admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1'

field.name: ma_yt
field.check: ma_yt not in (select ma_yt from xdmyt b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or @costUnit = '0')⩓ma_sp = '' and ma_bp = '' and so_lsx = '' and ma_bp0 = '' and ma_vt = ''

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp <> '' and ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from vxdmbp where truc_tiep = '1' and ma_bp in (select ma_bp from dmbp))

field.name: so_lsx
field.check: so_lsx <> '' and so_lsx not in (select so_lsx from phlsx b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or @costUnit = '0')

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 <> '' and ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from vxdmbp where truc_tiep = '0' and ma_bp in (select ma_bp from dmbp))

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt <> '' and ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: ma_yt
field.check: ma_yt not in (select ma_yt from xdmyt b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or @costUnit = '0')⩓ma_sp = '' and ma_bp = '' and so_lsx = '' and ma_bp0 = '' and ma_vt = ''

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp <> '' and ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from vxdmbp where truc_tiep = '1' and ma_bp in (select ma_bp from dmbp))

field.name: so_lsx
field.check: so_lsx <> '' and so_lsx not in (select so_lsx from phlsx b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or @costUnit = '0')

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 <> '' and ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from vxdmbp where truc_tiep = '0' and ma_bp in (select ma_bp from dmbp))

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt <> '' and ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where ngay_ks >= @dateCurrent)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_new = 1)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_edit = 1)
field.condition: if @costUnit = '1' begin⩓if @costUnit = '1' begin⩓if @costUnit = '1' begin if @@admin <> 1 begin⩓if @costUnit = '1' begin if @@admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1'

text.v: Khai báo hệ số phân bổ
